headline: Tracking Al Gore's Generation Investment Management Portfolio - Q4 2024 Update
summary: Generation Investment Management reduces portfolio value to $19.17B, adds stakes in GOOG & TTAN, boosts Schwab, MercadoLibre, cuts Amazon & Trimble.

raw.headline: Tracking Al Gore's Generation Investment Management Portfolio - Q4 2024 Update
raw.summary: Generation Investment Management reduces portfolio value to $19.17B, adds stakes in GOOG & TTAN, boosts Schwab, MercadoLibre, cuts Amazon & Trimble.

headline: 3 US Stocks Estimated To Be Trading Below Their Intrinsic Values
summary: In a week marked by significant declines across major U.S. indices, with the Dow experiencing its worst performance since October and the Nasdaq facing its largest drop in three months, investors are keenly searching for opportunities amid broader market volatility. Identifying stocks trading below their intrinsic values can offer potential value plays, especially when economic indicators and policy uncertainties weigh heavily on market sentiment.
